page.title: 12WELFARE IN DIPTFORD
page.content: The {Doctor} will come when we telephone the local health centre, but they prefer us to go to them. Many health centres serve our area and all severe cases go to Torbay {Hospital}. Emergency calls are made by dialling 999 then an ambulance will reach us as quickly as possible and take us to a casualty department. The District { {Nurse} visits people who have come out of hospital after an operation. She travels from South Brent to see the sick and elderly people who need attention. Often she dresses wounds and gives injections to save people from travelling to the Health Centre.
